atbat.des: Ryan Zimmerman grounds out, shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Mark Trumbo.

pitch.cc: Joel Pineiro went back to the four-seam fastball even though Ryan Zimmerman hit for a single last time up.
Joel Pineiro got Ryan Zimmerman to chase a slider that he doesn't like to hit.

atbat.des: Laynce Nix homers (12) on a fly ball to right center field.
Michael Morse singles on a line drive to center fielder Peter Bourjos.
Danny Espinosa flies out to left fielder Vernon Wells.

pitch.cc: Joel Pineiro has thrown 75 pitches; he holds opposing hitters to a .303 average in the first 75 pitches and .297 after that.

atbat.des: Wilson Ramos singles on a line drive to center fielder Peter Bourjos. Michael Morse to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Joel Pineiro is trying to tie up Wilson Ramos with fastballs inside, where Wilson Ramos hits .154.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Hisanori Takahashi replaces Joel Pineiro.

atbat.des: Matt Stairs singles on a ground ball to left fielder Vernon Wells. Michael Morse scores. Wilson Ramos to 2nd.
Ian Desmond walks. Wilson Ramos to 3rd. Matt Stairs to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Ian Desmond may sit on the changeup here, since Hisanori Takahashi would rather go after him than on-deck hitter Wilson Ramos.

atbat.des: Roger Bernadina reaches on fielding error by first baseman Mark Trumbo. Wilson Ramos scores. Matt Stairs scores. Ian Desmond to 3rd.

pitch.cc: Hisanori Takahashi is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump Scott Barry.

atbat.des: Erick Aybar homers (5) on a fly ball to right field.

pitch.cc: Jason Marquis battled back from 3-0 to retire Erick Aybar.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Collin Balester replaces Jason Marquis.

atbat.des: Torii Hunter singles on a ground ball to center fielder Roger Bernadina.

pitch.cc: Collin Balester had Torii Hunter down 0-2 but could not put him away.
Collin Balester is trying to tie up Bobby Abreu with fastballs inside, where Bobby Abreu hits .500.

atbat.des: Vernon Wells homers (10) on a fly ball to left center field. Torii Hunter scores.
Howard Kendrick reaches on throwing error by third baseman Ryan Zimmerman.

action.des: With Alberto Callaspo batting, wild pitch by Collin Balester, Howard Kendrick to 2nd.
With Alberto Callaspo batting, throwing error by Collin Balester on the pickoff attempt, Howard Kendrick to 3rd.
Pitcher Change: Todd Coffey replaces Collin Balester.

pitch.cc: Todd Coffey went back to the slider even though Mark Trumbo hit for a single last time up.
Todd Coffey has his out pitch working today, recording 7 of his 10 strikeouts with it so far.

action.des: With Hank Conger batting, Alberto Callaspo steals (3) 2nd base.

atbat.des: Hank Conger flies out to right fielder Jayson Werth.

pitch.cc: Todd Coffey is getting squeezed this inning by home plate ump Scott Barry.
